name: Hentai Puzzle Classic
description: Hentai Puzzle Classic - this is a new erotic puzzle-game in which you will need to solve different pictures.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: 32-bit or 64-bit | Windows XP,7,8,10 处理器: 2 Ghz Dual Core 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Any graphics card with DirectX 10 DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 511 MB 可用空间 声卡: Windows compatible 附注事项: The game may not display well at low screen resolutions!
